levelList.name: Cries Seeking Something
levelList.desc:
Clash Power +2 for every surviving Old Umbrella
Deal +25% damage for every Old Umbrella
At the end of the turn, all Old Umbrella expire
At the end of the turn, gain <sprite name="WaveFoxUmbrella"><color=#f8c200><u><link="WaveFoxUmbrella">Protection Umbrella</color></link></u> equal to the number of <sprite name="WaveFoxUmbrella"><color=#f8c200><u><link="WaveFoxUmbrella">Protection Umbrella</color></link></u> gained in the first turn

levelList.name: Coil Up
levelList.desc:
If this Skill is on a slot, head gains 50 Shield HP for every <sprite name="SelfCharge"><color=#a16a3b><u><link="SelfCharge">Self-charge</color></link></u>.
If the head is broken, gain 25 Shield HP for every <sprite name="SelfCharge"><color=#a16a3b><u><link="SelfCharge">Self-charge instead.</color></link></u>
Spend 1 Self-charge for every amount of Shield HP lost equal to the Shield HP gained for every Self-charge

levelList.name: Wriggling Head
levelList.desc:

[DefeatDuel] Lose 1 Self-charge
